title: of State at the Department of Enterprise, Tourism and Employment) Order 2025.
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister 
of State at the Department of Enterprise, Tourism and Employment) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department enterprise tourism employment) order 2025

title: of State at the Department of Enterprise, Tourism and Employment) Order 2025.
heading: 2. Shane Cassells, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Shane Cassells, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Enterprise, Tourism and Employment, is appointed 
to be a Special Adviser to Niamh Smyth, Minister of State at the Department of 
Enterprise, Tourism and Employment with effect from 6 March 2025 to 9 May
text_norm: 2 shane cassells particular whose address deposited office department enterprise tourism employment appointed special adviser niamh smyth minister state department enterprise tourism employment effect 6 march 2025 9 may

title: of State at the Department of Enterprise, Tourism and Employment) Order 2025.
heading: GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government,
text_raw:
2025. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

1 July, 2025. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Tánaiste. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 8th July, 2025.
